Earn ₦600K in 8 Weeks with Data analytics (No Tech Skills required!)

Yes, you read that right! You don’t need a tech background, coding skills, or a degree in statistics to start a high-paying career in Data Analytics. This course will teach you the data analysis, visualization, and reporting skills you need to land remote jobs, freelance gigs, or full-time positions in top companies.

If you’re looking for a get-rich-quick scheme, please skip this. If you think data analytics is too complex or only for mathematicians, don’t worry—we break everything down step by step. If you’re ready to learn, this course will transform your skills in just 8 weeks!

 

lets get started!!!

Here's Why You NEED
to Act NOW!

Our Data Analytics Mastery Program is designed to help ANYONE—whether you’re a student, freelancer, job seeker, or business professional—earn ₦600,000+ monthly by mastering high-demand Data Analytics skills that businesses and tech companies rely on.

It doesn’t matter if:

  • You have no background in coding or statistics (we’ll teach you from scratch, step by step!).
  • You don’t know how to analyze data (you’ll master Excel, SQL, Power BI & AI tools).
  • You’ve never worked in tech before (this is the easiest way to break in!).
  • You don’t know where to find clients or job opportunities (we’ll show you exactly where & how).
Enroll Now

Where You Can Make Money After Training:

Why This Course is Worth ₦800,000

Introduction to Data Analytics & Business Intelligence

Understand how data is used in business decision-making.

Google Sheets & Automation

Learn how to process, analyze, and visualize data in Google Sheets.

SQL for Data Management

Store, retrieve, and analyze large datasets using SQL databases.

Sales Funnel Strategies

Build funnels that convert leads into paying clients.

Data Visualization with Power BI & Tableau

Learn how to present data with stunning dashboards and charts.

Building a Data-Driven Portfolio

Learn how to work on real-world data projects and build a portfolio that attracts employers.

Freelancing & Job Search Strategies

Discover how to start earning ₦600,000+ monthly as a Data Analyst or Business Intelligence professional.

Enroll Now

who is this For?

1

Students & Fresh Graduates Who Want a High-Paying Skill

Learn a future-proof digital skill that is in high demand worldwide.

2

Expand your services and start charging premium rates for Data Analytics projects.

3

Aspiring Tech Professionals Who Want to Break into Tech

You don’t need prior experience to start a tech career—learn Data Analytics and start working in tech.

4

Job Seekers Looking for Better Opportunities

Many employers are now seeking candidates with data analysis skills. This course will give you an edge in the job market.

Enroll Now

don't miss out!! Practically a Giveaway

  • If you enroll TODAY, you’ll pay just ₦350,000!
  • Pay within 12 hours, and we’ll further slash it to ₦200,000 ONLY!

That’s a ₦400,000 discount—a small investment for the skills that can set you up for a lifetime of success. 

Offer Ends in

Enroll Now

we’re here to Answer all your questions

Do I need any prior experience to take this course?

No, absolutely no prior experience is required! This course is designed for beginners, and we’ll guide you step-by-step through everything, from the basics to advanced data analysis techniques. Whether you’re starting with zero knowledge or just looking to build your skills, we’ve got you covered.

 

How long does it take to complete the course?

The course is designed to be completed in just 8 weeks. We break down the lessons into manageable weekly segments so you can learn at your own pace, but we recommend dedicating a few hours each week to ensure maximum retention and success.

Will I be able to get a job after completing this course?

Yes! This course is specifically designed to equip you with the skills you need to land a high-paying job or start freelancing as a Data Analyst or Business Intelligence professional. Plus, we provide job search strategies and access to a network of recruiters and industry professionals to help you get hired.

Will I get any hands-on practice during the course?

Yes! The course includes practical exercises, real-world projects, and hands-on experience with tools like Excel, SQL and Power BI. You’ll also build a portfolio of data projects to showcase your skills to potential employers or clients.

 

How much can I expect to earn after completing the course?

After mastering Data Analytics, many of our students earn ₦600,000+ monthly through full-time jobs, freelance gigs, or remote opportunities. Your potential earnings will depend on the number of clients you work with, the type of job you secure, and your level of experience.

don't Miss Out
